creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: large torque with three rings; each ring curves over on itself; curved portion has a bird etching on it; connecting piece has wrapped wire, with a large wire cover in the center; ring one, the smallest ring, has two swan-like birds at center, surrounded by four panels of floral designs; ring two has two hummingbirds at center, a panel with two insects on both sides of the hummingbirds; ring three has two toucan-like birds at center, surrounded by panels with one peacock-like bird and two hummingbirds
title: Torque
